channel.title: Swift on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Swift on SoftLayer API

item.title: Object Storage Uploader
item.description: Overview Weâ€™ve recently added the option to import customer-supplied Virtual Hard Disks (VHDs) to our object storage offering. This is a great option for our customers who may have special virtual machines that they have spent hours perfecting. Since learning to import these images can pose a slight challenge, especially for those unfamiliar with object storage (OpenStack Swift), I wrote this blog to share scripts that will streamline the process.
